title: Architectural Photography
description: Capturing space and light in built environments
fullDescription: A series of architectural photographs exploring the relationship between natural light and spatial design. These images capture moments where light transforms space, creating atmospheric conditions that enhance the built environment.

title: Urban Sketches
description: City life captured through observational drawing
fullDescription: Quick observational sketches of urban environments, capturing the dynamic energy of city life. These drawings serve as visual notes, documenting moments and spaces that inspire design thinking.

title: Material Studies
description: Exploring texture, form, and material properties
fullDescription: Hands-on exploration of materials and their properties, understanding how different textures, weights, and compositions can inform design decisions. This research informs sustainable design practices.

title: Conceptual Models
fullDescription: Three-dimensional explorations of spatial concepts through physical model making. These models help test ideas about form, proportion, and spatial relationships in tangible ways.

title: Digital Experiments
fullDescription: Experiments in parametric design using computational tools to generate form and explore design possibilities. These digital explorations push the boundaries of traditional design processes.

title: Travel Documentation
description: Design inspirations from around the world
fullDescription: Visual documentation of design inspiration gathered during travels. These images capture architectural details, urban planning solutions, and cultural approaches to space that inform my design thinking.

title: Sustainability Research
fullDescription: Research into sustainable design practices, exploring how environmental considerations can be integrated into design processes from concept to execution.

title: Workshop Creations
fullDescription: Objects and prototypes created through hands-on workshop processes. These pieces explore the relationship between digital design tools and traditional making techniques.

title: Design Iterations
description: Process documentation and evolution of ideas
fullDescription: Documentation of the design process, showing how ideas evolve through iteration, feedback, and refinement. This work demonstrates the value of process over final outcomes.
